english.segment1: Speak to my heart, Holy Spirit. Give me the words that will bring new life. Words on the wings of the morning. the dark night will fade away. If you speak to my heart
english.segment2: Speak to my heart, Holy Spirit. Message of love to encourage me. Lifting my heart from despair. How you loved me and cared for me. If speak to my Heart
english.segment3: Speak to my Heart Lord. Give me your Holy Word. If I can hear from you,then I'll know what to do. I won't go alone, I'll never go on my own. Just let your Spirit guide and let your word abide. Speak to my Heart.
